title: Wo Zai Dong Bei Zuo Bai Shi De Na Xie Nian
overview: Chu Sheng followed Master Qin in the northeast to do funeral business, for all kinds of dead people. During that, there were many strange funeral anecdotes. As a professional undertaker, Chu Sheng visited the folk together with the Reporter Lin who came to explore the weird stories and experienced one after another bizarre folk stories.
